sentence: Even management went the extra mile when we were checking out to assist us with the bags to the foyer and this was the operations manager no less
Impressed with the personal service and the large breakfast banquet but the property itself is dull and showing its age
Lush green gardens greet you from the foyer on check in and all the staff were helpful and very friendly
We feel special taken intonthe lounge and given a refreshing welcome drink meeting Mr Didi Amy Jan and Alfieetc
We really enjoyed our stay at the Pullman overall the food was good although my son and I did become ill after eating at Sundays polside banquet
The whole venue is beautiful and clean
Fantastic venue and location the Pullman staff were 100 attentive throughout my visit
This time we able to enjoy the special event exhibition
Staff were excellent the rooms were cleaned daily the breakfast had a vast array of choices and the special events like the fire dance and the seafood night were excellent
There is a convenient store on property which was great a well functioning kids club and the spa is just amazing
When inquiring the hotel staff informed us that the event was going to go on till 11 PM
Overall we probably would stay again if we came back to Bali but would check there is no function on
Too old in almost every aspect room is to dim air condition was not functioning well

Kids club was a huge hut with my 6 year old and it was great they advertised on the board what was on each day my only suggestion would be to do this for other events in the hotel eg we returned one night half way through a fire show
Only sigestion would be a noticeboard on foyer regarding days activities meals etc
Far less foot traffic of the other venues further south and more quiet with across the street access to Legian Beach for a beer as the sunsets
Had a weeks leave leading up to the end of the year the Pullman gave us the perfect venue to unwind reset after a very busy period
The floor is dirty power outlets are extremely bad half in my room are not usable water system is ridiculously bot function well all are very old rooms are lacked of lights
I would have to say the banquet staff did an exceptional job
Conventions are great money spinners but not when it means that a large portion of the recreation area is removed from guest use in one case for two days
I stayed in the hotel for a business purpose which was some kind of training in one of the meeting rooms at the hotel

What we did find annoying especially with a tired 4 year old was on some banquet nights the bands that they chose were loud beyond acceptable and even though the rule was that the music should be reduced around 9 pm and off by 930 some nights it was like having a rock concert in your room and turning volume down just did n’t happen
